select hidnum, hidname from headid t1, bcategory t2 where t1.catnum = t2.catnum

select t1.bnum, t2.catname as "bcategory.catname", t3.hidname as "hidcategory.hidname" , t1.btitle, t4.nickname as "bnickname", t1.bcdate, t1.bhits from board t1, bcategory t2, headid t3,member t4 where t1.bcategory = t2.catnum and t1.hidcategory = t3.hidnum and t1.ucode = t4.ucode
mapper.insert: insert into board(bnum, bcategory, hidcategory, ucode, btitle, bcontent, bgroup, bstep, bindent ) values( bnum_seq.nextval, #{bcategory.catnum}, #{hidcategory.hidnum}, #{ucode}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, bnum_seq.nextVal, 0, 0)
